item.description: SINGLES WELCOME. There will be plenty of Singles to dance with. Try the all-levels EC Swing class which starts at 7:15pm followed by a social dance from 8-11pm. Dance hosts & social mixers gets everyone up and dancing to Latin, Ballroom & Contemporary music. The lounge area hosts a cash bar, coffee service and lite refreshments. Admission is $15pp which includes the lesson, dance & refreshments. Proper dress.

group.name: Salsa, Swing, Latin & Ballroom Dancers of Metro Worcester

item.name: Ballroom & Latin Dance Lounge
